column1: so...turns out the great @potus was right again!! LETTER TO THE EDITOR Cell Research Remdesivir and CHLOROQUINE effectively inhibit the recently emerged novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) in vitro. Cell Research (2020) 0:1â€“3

I think, at the moment, enough people are being non-compliant with coronavirus restrictions that the people who are trying to be will gradually start to take a "screw this" attitude. All we can hope for is that the prevalence of the virus is low enough not to spread again.
